title: Relation Networks
body_html:
WIP PR for relation networks. Just realised this could be moved into functional as when passing in f and g, the relation network doesn't have any parameters itself.

This also has my layer norm code, so ignore that for now, as I'll work on getting that ready for merge this weekend, and then come back to this. This is just to let people know that it is fairly easy and efficient to do RNs in PyTorch and I'll get it to it soon enough ;)

body:
WIP PR for relation networks. Just realised this could be moved into functional as when passing in f and g, the relation network doesn't have any parameters itself.

This also has my layer norm code, so ignore that for now, as I'll work on getting that ready for merge this weekend, and then come back to this. This is just to let people know that it is fairly easy and efficient to do RNs in PyTorch and I'll get it to it soon enough ;)
